main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Belleview, Florida on 15 March 1957, involving an object smaller than a star moving in a western direction.
interesting points: The object was white and did not leave a trail or display any speed,The observation lasted over 1 hour using binoculars,There were signs that the object might be a balloon,The sighting was classified under Project Blue Book as a probable balloon,Another report on 17 March 1957 described a bright light moving at high speed with no visible lights.
sighted object: one object smaller than a star
